researchItems.title: Governance & Research
researchItems.description: Empowering Web3 contributors through workshops, seminars, and hackathons. Learn, build, and engage with DAOs like Arbitrum & Optimism.

researchItems.title: DAO Governance
researchItems.description: Explore decentralized decision-making processes and voting mechanisms. Understand how DAOs operate and make collective decisions in the Web3 ecosystem.

researchItems.title: Research Initiatives
researchItems.description: Conducting cutting-edge research in blockchain technology, DeFi protocols, and governance mechanisms. Contributing to the advancement of Web3 knowledge.

researchItems.title: Community Building
researchItems.description: Fostering a vibrant community of researchers, developers, and governance enthusiasts. Building bridges between traditional academia and Web3 innovation.

researchItems.title: Educational Programs
researchItems.description: Developing comprehensive educational resources and training programs for Web3 governance. Making complex concepts accessible to everyone.
